item.description:
Did you hear? We're turning 4 years old! So someone said, "hey, let's throw ourselves a birthday party."  Here are the top 3 reasons why you should absolutely get dressed up and come out to TMIRCE's IN4MAL Birthday Party.

  1. This is by far, the largest event we have and it only happens once a year. The people that you normally see in running clothes and on the streets will be decked out in their finest party gear. Wait, what? You heard me. This is a FANCY event - held at the prestigious Courtyard Marriott in Cambridge. Dress to impress.
  2. The raffle is one of the best you'll come across at any informal event. You can purchase tickets at the door. 5 for $5, 10 for $10 and wingspan for $20. Here's a taste of what's in store:
    • Local restaurant gift certificate dinner's 
    • City Sports gift cards and other gear
    • Reach the Beach Relay running gear
    • Race Menu - 4 entries to the Monster Dash and Bash party
    • Grand Prize (The same as last year. Were you there? Who remembers?)
    • Sur-prize raffles that the organizers don't even know about yet
  3. Last years success of the Mix1 Dance Off has inspired us again to invite Katie Visco back to defend her title. Katie threw down some serious moves and won the dance off of the century, yielding her unprecedented Mix1 prizes. Does anyone have the guts to step up or face getting served? 

We are having our Annual Birthday Extravaganza at the Courtyard Marriott on Memorial Drive on Saturday, October 22nd at 7:00 pm.

$15.00 dollars per person. That of course is our suggested minimum since we are always raising money for the club. You can pay on PAYPAL here or at the door the night of the party. (Cash, Visa and Mastercard are ok.) All the money we make goes right back into the club for fun stuff like this.

You'll also get 1 Informal Drink Ticket for Domestic Bottled Beer and House Wine.There will be a fully stocked cash bar and some appetizers too! 

With special guests! 

 "What else do we need to know about this fun time?"

Bring your dance shoes. We have a DJ thats planning on bringing the roof down. And since this is a formal event, dress to impress and come ready to get down.

There's also going to be an incredible raffle with some top shelf prizes. Stay wired in for more details about the prizes so you should RSVP.

"Ok. We're in. How can we pay now if we want?"

You can PAY FOR EVENT here or through the information in the meetup event.

This is going to be the best party ever!

For Real.

Andy

group.name: Boston Informal Running Club: Home of TMIRCE:BOS

item.name: TMIRCE's IN4MAL Birthday. We're kind of a big deal.
